title: QTime mismatch with debug timing
description:
When debugQuery is on (or debug=timing) the result QTime does not match with the "timing" information shown in the debug listings.
It seems SearchHandler.java was not updated in the cluster mode w.r.t. debug info

Earlier I thought it was the request merging that took too long ( http://lucene.472066.n3.nabble.com/Result-merging-takes-too-long-td4122767.html )
